attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to reduce the amount of waste paper produced and the annoyance of junk mail, it should be illegal to put unsolicited advertising/marketing material through domestic letter boxes.  This causes environmental damage through the production of the junk mail.  It then has to be disposed of presenting further problems.  I personally, get a small bin full of junk mail every week all of which goes straight in the recycle bin.  If I dropped this junk mail in the street then I would be charged with littering.  However, anyone who wants can litter my front room with this junk under the current laws.  Therefore, junk mail should be banned.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban junk mail."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11040.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NoJunkMail/
